tool_description: Formats and prepares memory cards for optimal performance, checking for errors and setting appropriate file systems for different camera models.

card_types.description: Memory card types (SD, CF, XQD, CFexpress)

target_cameras.description: Camera models that will use these cards

verify_after_format.description: Whether to verify card integrity after formatting

error_messages: Mismatched card and camera compatibility: Ensure memory card types are compatible with target cameras.
Invalid format type: Use FAT32 for cards under 32GB, exFAT for larger cards, or UDF for professional workflows.
Card capacity mismatch: Verify that card capacities match the specified card types.
Empty parameters: Provide at least one entry for card_capacities, card_types, and target_cameras.
usage: Specify your memory cards' capacities, types, and target cameras. Choose appropriate format type and verification options. The tool will prepare cards for optimal camera performance.

formatted_cards.description: Successfully formatted memory cards with their specifications

failed_cards.description: Cards that failed formatting or verification

total_storage.description: Total available storage capacity across all cards

estimated_photos.description: Estimated number of photos that can be stored
